official-title.#text:
To provide an additional authorization of appropriations for the Brookwood-Sago Mine Safety Grants
			 to be used specifically to fund programs that provide hands-on mine safety
			 skills training and certification in mine rescue and mine emergency
			 response.

committee-name.#text: Committee on Education and the Workforce

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 14(g) of the Mine Improvement and New Emergency Response Act of 2006
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Mine Improvement and New Emergency Response Act of 2006/s:14/ss:g

text.#text: by adding at the end the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , there is authorized to be appropriated
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Mine Improvement and New Emergency Response Act of 2006/s:14/ss:g/p:1

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}prop.#text:
specifically for grants providing hands-on
			 mine safety skills training and certification in mine rescue and mine
			 emergency response

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: In addition to amounts authorized under

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 4606 IH: To provide an additional authorization of appropriations for the Brookwood-Sago Mine Safety Grants to be used specifically to fund programs that provide hands-on mine safety skills training and certification in mine rescue and mine emergency response.
